name: Ghost (working title)
description:
Genre: Puzzle / Platformer

Engine:   Unreal Engine 4

Description:  You're a ghost who isn't able to interact with the physical world. So you have to possess NPCs to use switches, which will trigger doors or elevators in the level.  The goal is to reach the target point as fast as possible.
But be aware: Light is your enemy and you can't stay long in your ghost form!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
F - Possess / Unpossess NPC
G - Use switches
R - Restart level

The game was made for the UE4 Summer Jam (Theme: Blessing in Disguise).

Credits:
- Flare Ignition SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/flare-ignition
- Spell SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/elemental-spell
- Switch SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/stove-switch
- Stone Texture: https://opengameart.org/content/stone-texture
